parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Seed for different images and reproducibility. Use -1 to randomise seed

parameters.name: frames

param_schema.title: Frames
param_schema.description: Length of the video in frames (playback is at 8 fps e.g. 16 frames @ 8 fps is 2 seconds)
